meanings.definition: A person who does not attend a particular event or activity.
meanings.sent1: The nonattenders missed the school play.
meanings.sent2: The nonattenders didn't show up for the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The nonattenders decided to have a movie night instead.
meanings.sent4: The nonattenders were like shadows, never seen at gatherings.
meanings.sent5: The nonattenders were like ghosts, always absent from the party.

meanings.definition: The act of not attending a specific event or activity.
meanings.sent1: The nonattenders of the conference disappointed the organizers.
meanings.sent2: The nonattenders of the workshop missed out on valuable information.
meanings.sent3: The nonattenders of the picnic had a peaceful day at home.
meanings.sent4: The nonattenders of the game left an empty space in the stands.
meanings.sent5: The nonattenders of the ceremony were notably absent from the crowd.
